page.title: 15Food
page.content: In 1955 people didn't have the same foods as we have now.It was only 10 years after the war and people didn't have as much money as they do now so they had cheaper things like Pig's Trotters.Then they had ice-cream and crisps but not flavoured ones but nowadays people have flavoured everything!They didn't have American foods like French Fries,Burgars and other things like that.In fact they didn't have many foreign foods at all.Turkey and Pheasant and Duck were quality foods that people didn't have very often and were luxury foods.In my class the favourite food for children being roast dinner with 10 people preferring that,2nd favourite meal is fish'n'chips with 9 people and then fishfingers and chips with 2 people.Nowadays people have more ready-packed foods and frozen foods.
